text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes Being awake from early in the morning to late at night isn’t the same as actually working. Tweeting and watching Fox News and reading the National Enquirer isn’t work either. Your daily batshit Coronavirus ranting is non-productive. You don’t know the meaning of the word WORK.
